items.sentence: You don\'t have to do that if you don\'t really want to.
You don\'t have to try to do that if you don\'t want to.
There is a certain amount of truth in what he\'s saying.
They did a DNA comparison to see if the body was Tom\'s.
Tom didn\'t know what the wood was going to be used for.
Tom and Mary walked out of the room, leaving John alone.
The kidnappers gagged Tom and locked him up in a closet.
Tom spends most of his spare time practicing the guitar.
After his father\'s death, Tom started drinking heavily.
He didn\'t like to ask for help even if he was starving.
He doesn\'t have any idea how important this meeting is.
Tom doesn\'t even know how to say "thank you" in French.
Tom doesn\'t have a very good French-English dictionary.
Tom doesn\'t have any friends he can talk to about this.
Tom doesn\'t have to dance with Mary unless he wants to.
Tom doesn\'t have what it takes to be a race car driver.
I noticed that Tom had a small tattoo on his right foot.
I now finally understand what Tom was trying to tell me.
I read a couple of more chapters before I went to sleep.
Tom\'s mother kept his graduation picture on the mantel.
